ygData.subject: RE: Gnomestock '99
ygData.msgSnippet: Noon on a Friday?  What college student is organizing this shindig anyhow? I don t want to sound *too* much like the decrepid cog in the workforce that I am,
ygData.messageBody:
Noon on a Friday? What college student is organizing this shindig anyhow?
I don't want to sound *too* much like the decrepid cog in the workforce that
I am, but some of us might have to work and stuff.

Gncrier

> From: "Robin Wise 3" <eurmali@...>
>
> OK, some details on the running of of gnomes...
>
> Make a first-level gnome on E'ci. Give him/her a name beginning with Gn,
> preferably followed by your bard's name (e.g. Gnkitasi, Gnaloro).
>
> Meet at noon PST this Friday (11/26/99) in Ak'Anon. We have offers of
> teleports, and will try to get everyone rounded up and bound in
> Freeport for
> the run. I understand that some people can't be there then, but
> we all have
> scheduling problems, and some people can't make it at other times. Once
> gathered in Freeport, we will run to lavastorm and hurl ourselves
> into the
> lava pits en masse.
>
> So far about a dozen people have responded... I'd really like to
> see this
> bring the EQ bardic community together, as much as possible. I've posted
> this information on the bard boards I frequent, and will send it into the
> spoiler sites soon.
>
> Hope to see you all there!
>
> Gnaloro
